sentence.Network_en: South Africa was going through a period of irreversible change.
sentence.Network_cn: 南非正在经历一场不可逆转的变革。

sentence.Network_en: The whole of Africa had been buffeted by social and political upheavals.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个非洲都经受了社会和政治动荡之苦。

sentence.Network_en: Mandela said, "We want a united, undivided South Africa".
sentence.Network_cn: 曼德拉说道：“我们想要一个团结统一的南非。”

Sentence.sentence: Demographers (人口统计学者) reckon that three-quarters of humanity could be city-dwelling by 2050, with most of the increase coming in the fast-growing towns of Asia and Africa.
It is in this year that urbanisation made a start in Asia and Africa
The population increase in cities reached a new peak in Asia and Africa.
